name: SliverPersistentHeader
desc: A sliver whose size varies when the sliver is scrolled to the edge of the viewport opposite the sliver's [GrowthDirection].

fields.name: pinned
fields.desc: Whether to stick the header to the start of the viewport once it has reached its minimum size.

fields.name: floating
fields.desc: Whether the header should immediately grow again if the user reverses scroll direction.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of SliverPersistentHeader
desc: 【pinned】: Whether to stay at the top 【bool】
